column1: Funeral services for Sharon Rose Daniels will be conducted Tuesday June 23
column2: 2015 at 1:00 P.M. at the Engle-Bowling Funeral Home on East Main Street with Larry Gross officiating. The interment will follow at the Howard Cemetery at Busy
column3: Ky. The visitation will be at the Engle-Bowling Funeral Home on Monday Evening from 6:00 till 9:00 P.M.
